Description.Text: The rooms have autonomous air-conditioning and heating and the rest of the facilities include: hair-dryer, safebox, mini-bar, TV LED 32’’, satellite TV, telephone, cosmetic amenities, mirror off de make-up, room service, balcony, free wi-fi internet. Face clothes and iron facilities are available upon request. Hotel Facilities – Services: Outdoor Aqua Gym & Spa, Reception, Lobby, Breakfast Room, Café-Bar, Snack Bar, Roof Garden, Wi-Fi, Room Service, Fax services, Laundry.

Distances from Nikiana Lefkada: 100m from the sea, 200m from the beach (“Κ” Beach Bar), 700m before the landing dock of small vessels, 800m before Nikiana village (there is a harbour), 2km after Lygia village (there is a harbour), 7Κm after Lefkada town, 9km before Nydri, 22km from the “Preveza-Actio” airport.
